just one of others, only He Knows, in a Wisdom that is only His.
His attributes are perfect in their capabilities, detail, timeliness, and dimensions. High is He above His creation/creations... this may be
And His Attributes are an explanation, for us, to understand His capabilities. our capabilities can be parallelled; His can't.
As mentioned previously, His Footstool, is like a ring thrown in a desert.We know His Footstool extends over the heavens and earth.
At any rate, we know, the time we spend won'treturn. We can spend: i)wisely, benefitting ii)frivolously neither gain nor lose iii)by harming
In terms of time the longer we are here, the less we have left. But the Hereafter is permanent. Depends on individual belief.

The world: when her back is to you is the most beautiful ever. But when she is facing you, the most horrendous, scariest ever. Why?!
